mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no boardNo, b.board_title boardTitle, b.board_cat_cd boardCatCd, b.user_id userId, u.user_nm userNm, b.c_date cDate, b.board_view boardView FROM board b INNER JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_cat_cd = #{boardCatCd} ORDER BY b.c_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE board_cat_cd = #{boardCatCd}
SELECT dept_cd deptCd, (SELECT code_nm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001'AND CODE = dept_cd) deptNm FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId};
SELECT code, code_nm codeNm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001'

SELECT b.board_no boardNo, b.board_cat_cd boardCatCd, b.board_title boardTitle, b.board_contents boardContents, b.user_id userId, b.c_date cDate, b.board_view boardView, bf.origin_filename originFilename, bf.path FROM board b left JOIN board_file bf ON b.board_no = bf.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_nm userNm, c.code_nm codeNm FROM user u INNER JOIN common_code c ON u.rank_cd = c.code AND c.group_code = 'R001' WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_view = board_view + 1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id userId, user_nm userNm, (SELECT code_nm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'R001' AND CODE = rank_cd) userRank, (SELECT code_nm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001' AND CODE = dept_cd) userDept FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_cat_cd = #{boardCatCd}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_contents = #{boardContents}, u_date = NOW() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
